Accept.title: Accept
Accept.description: Specify the Accept Value in the header

accountParams.title: accountParams
accountParams.description: Configure the below for Importing Accounts

accountThresholdValue.title: accountThresholdValue
accountThresholdValue.description: Specify accountThresholdValue as 10 to suspend or delete a maximum of 10 accounts. If the number of accounts exceeds the threshold value, no action (suspension or deletion) is taken on the existing accounts

acctEntMappings.title: acctEntMappings
acctEntMappings.description: Configure the below to set the Account-Entitlement Mapping during Account Import

acctEntParams.title: acctEntParams
acctEntParams.description: Configure the below for Accounts & Entitlements Association

acctIdPath.title: acctIdPath
acctIdPath.description: Use this variable to define the path of the account ID in the respose JSON.

acctKeyField.title: acctKeyField
acctKeyField.description: Use this variable to define the key field that uniquely identifies the account.

activeStatus.title: activeStatus
activeStatus.description: Specify the values for that are identified as Active from the API response

Authorization.title: Authorization
Authorization.description: Specify the Authorizaion Value in the header

call.title: call
call.description: Configure the below to make a call to the <Application> API

callOrder.title: callOrder
callOrder.description:
Specify the order to call APIs
Specify the value for the first call as zero. The lowest order value is called the first call

Columns to Properties Mapping.title: Columns to Properties Mapping
Columns to Properties Mapping.description: Specify the mapping between the target application objects and EIC account objects

connection.title: connection
connection.description: Specify the connection name defined in the connection policy

correlateInactiveAccounts.title: correlateInactiveAccounts
correlateInactiveAccounts.description: Specify correlateInactiveAccounts as false if you do not want to correlate inactive accounts to users. If true, the connector correlates inactive accounts to users

deleteAccEntForActiveAccounts.title: deleteAccEntForActiveAccounts
deleteAccEntForActiveAccounts.description: Specify deleteAccEntForActiveAccounts as true to remove deleted entitlements from Entitlement Hierarchy of the Account

deleteLinks.title: deleteLinks
deleteLinks.description: Specify deleteLinks as true to allow the recon job to remove the deleted account from EIC if it has been deleted from your application

disableDeletedEntitlements.title: disableDeletedEntitlements
disableDeletedEntitlements.description: This variable is no longer required after the introduction of the statusAndThresholdConfig variable. Set this to false in the current codebase.

entitlementParams.title: entitlementParams
entitlementParams.description: Configure the below for Importing Entitlements

entKeyField.title: entKeyField
entKeyField.description: Use this variable to define the key field that uniquely identifies the entitlement value.

entTypeOrder.title: entTypeOrder
entTypeOrder.description: Specify entitlement type order as 0 for the first entitlement type and for the second entitlement type specify 1.

entTypes.title: entTypes
entTypes.description: Specify all the entitlement types to import below

Group.title: Group
Group.description: Configure the below for Group entType Call

http.title: http
http.description: Specify the below parameters to invoke the API

httpContentType.title: httpContentType
httpContentType.description: Specify the Content-Type for the API call

httpHeaders.title: httpHeaders
httpHeaders.description: Specify the headers for the API call

httpMethod.title: httpMethod
httpMethod.description: Specify the Http Method for the API call

idPath.title: idPath
idPath.description: Specify the JSON key in API Response that holds the unique value and gets mapped to the keyField

inactivateAccountsNotInFile.title: inactivateAccountsNotInFile
inactivateAccountsNotInFile.description: Specify inactivateAccountsNotInFile as true to change the status of accounts in EIC to inactive if the accounts are not in the list when the import job is triggered

keyField.title: keyField
keyField.description: Specify accountID that EIC uses to identify whether the incoming account object is a new account or an existing account

listField.title: listField
listField.description: Specify the path in the API response to the list of account objects

listPath.title: listPath
listPath.description: Specify the JSON key to the array in the API Response which holds the entitlements. In case the entitlements are not available as an array ignore the entry.

nextUrl.title: nextUrl
nextUrl.description: Configure the below to build the nextUrl used for paged results

nextUrlPath.title: nextUrlPath
nextUrlPath.description:
Specify the condition that checks for nextUrl path, that is, next_page in the response
If the path with the URL is found, it moves to the next page else, it stops

pagination.title: pagination
pagination.description: Configure the below to allow paged results in the call response

Role.title: Role
Role.description: Configure the below for Role entType Call

stageNumber.title: stageNumber
stageNumber.description: Specify the stage number as zero for the first API call

statusAndThresholdConfig.title: statusAndThresholdConfig
statusAndThresholdConfig.description: Specify this parameter to allow the connector to perform different actions during account or access import

statusColumn.title: statusColumn
statusColumn.description: Specify the EIC attribute which holds the status value

url.title: url
url.description: Specify the URL for the API call
